posts: Pure pace unleashed! Robin Liddell in the #71 Aston Martin absolutely flew, clocking the fastest lap of the race at 1:55.836. What a flyer! 🚀 #IMSA #AstonMartin #RacePace
Manufacturer Showdown: BMW takes top honors for overall pace! Their cars consistently ran quicker than the field average. Dominance defined. 📊 #IMSA #BMW #MotorsportAnalytics
The Metronome Award goes to Tyler Gonzalez in the #99 Hyundai! With a lap time consistency std dev of just 0.025s, his precision was unmatched. Incredible focus! ⏱️ #IMSA #Hyundai #Consistency

Data reveals untapped potential! Harry Gottsacker in the #98 Hyundai could theoretically shave 0.735s off his fastest lap. The speed is there, just waiting to be unlocked! 🚀 #IMSA #RaceData #Potential
Talk about seamless! The #13 Ford of Jenson Altzman & Chad McCumbee showed incredible driver consistency with only a 0.014s lap time delta between them. True teamwork! 🤝 #IMSA #Ford #Teamwork
Pit stop prowess! CarBahn's #4 BMW showcased lightning-fast pit cycle times, leading the field in efficiency. Every second counts, and they nailed it. 💨 #IMSA #PitStop #Efficiency

Tire wear woes for Audi. Our analysis shows they struggled most with tire degradation, particularly the #56 car with over 20s loss per 5 laps! A key area for improvement. 📉 #IMSA #Audi #TireManagement
